## createTrailingNodePlugin variable

Create the paragraph plugin which can check the end of the document and insert a new node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createTrailingNodePlugin: ({ extension, tags, schema }: CreateTrailingNodePluginParams) => Plugin<boolean, any>
```
